content.question: Which of the following is an example of congressional oversight?

choices.label: Holding hearings for review of an executive agency’s activities
Reporting campaign contributions to the Federal Election Commission
Signing trade agreements with other countries without input from the president
Conducting ethics investigations of congressional leadership

content.answer: Holding hearings for review of an executive agency’s activities

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
